main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Ft. Erwin, California on April 13, 1967, which decayed from a solid state into a green haze.
interesting points: The object was initially solid and roughly the size of a dinner plate,It decayed into smaller pieces which disappeared from view,The sighting lasted about 1 minute and occurred in clear sky conditions during late afternoon,The object emitted a distant noise similar to a jet engine but was largely silent,The object appeared metallic with navigational lights but lacked wings or a fuselage.
sighted object: one large metallic object that decayed into smaller pieces
